files.name: CHANGELOG
files.content:
[20241208]
 * Improve gtk4 source code highlighting theme
 * Update upstream code for version 47.2
 * Update theme tweaks
 * Regenerate all themes
 * Remove color variants now that gnome supports accent colors
 * Update build process
 * Remove no longer needed files
 * Update Makefile

[20240922]
 * Update upstream code to 47.0 release
 * Remove no longer needed switch and checkbox assets
 * Add new missing color variable
 * Update slider tweaks
 * Remove slider-handle-radius
 * Remove css pointing to old assets
 * Regenerate all themes

[20240813]
 * Update for GNOME 46.4
 * Use reverse changes list order in CHANGELOG

[20240721]
 * Generate all theme variants
 * Fix dash-to-dock running-dot

[20240706]
 * Fix dash and grid running-dot position
 * Update upstream code for version 46.3.1

[20240526]
 * Regenerate all themes
 * Update gdm theme

[20240503]
 * Remove background from list-search-result

[20240418]
 * Regenerate all themes
 * Remove background from icons in dash
 * Remove old code
 * Use less transparent background for hovered apps inside folder-dialog
 * Remove outline in focused search-bar
 * Add outline to popover cards
 * Make dash transparent

[20240411]
 * Regenerate all themes
 * Add new color variables
 * Update theme tweaks for GNOME 46
 * Update upstream theme for version 46

[20231026]
 * Update gtk3 sourceview color-themes
 * Update gtk4 sourceview color-themes
 * Remove slider handle
 * Regenerate all themes
 * Update theme tweaks
 * Update upstream theme for version 45

[20230606]
 * Regenerate all themes
 * Update for gnome-shell 44.2

[20230508]
 * Ignore error on make install if gnome-shell-theme.gresource.old already exists

[20230507]
 * Update gnome-shell version in fedora .spec file
 * Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/gnome-44'
 * Regenerate all themes
 * Fix app grid text color in light themes
 * Code clean
 * Avoid showing volume and workspace-switcher osd over dash-to-dock
 * Regenerate themes
 * Update _common-tweaks.scss
 * Sync _colors.scss with upstream updates
 * Update upstream code
 * Add color-scheme for gnome-text-editor

[20221107]
 * Regenerate all themes
 * Update tweaks for gnome 43
 * Update upstream code to gnome 43

[20220622]
 * Match side panel button's border-radius with panel corners

[20220524]
 * Use grey color for selected user in gdm
 * Gnome-Shell: add background for panel-button on mouse-over

[20220510]
 * Fix calendar legibility caused by em margins
 * Update ubuntu release

[20220422]
 * Fix Flat-Remix session

[20220421]
 * Regenerate all themes
 * Update assets for gresources file
 * Update assets
 * Add icon-shadow to dash icons
 * Add patch for keyboard stylesheet
 * Fix indentation

[20220407]
 * Update packaging
 * Generate new themes
 * Update theme tweaks for gnome 42
 * Update upstream code to gnome 42

[20211223]
 * Add missing icon checkbox-off-focused-darkest

[20211202]
 * Update for GNOME 41.1
 * Improve background of hovered itens in calendar popover
 * Fix aur release script

[20211113]
 * Improve script to package aur and fedora
 * Package themes by color only
 * Add script to generate custom themes
 * Improve fedora package spec file
 * Add all new color variants
 * Make datemenu-today-button flat
 * Fix Requires value in fedora spec

[20211105]
 * Make some widgets in the calendar popup more flat
 * Update fedora package dependencies
 * Add gnome-shell-extensions dependency for Ubuntu
 * Update gresource packaged theme
 * Fix gdm theme for Ubuntu

[20211028]
 * Update gresource packaged theme
 * Make folder shadow a bit lighter to improve contrast
 * Update launchpad_release script
 * Update debian packaging

[20210921]
 * Update theme for GNOME 41

[20210716]
 * Fix .app-folder background

[20210715]
 * Regenerate themes
 * Recover icon and text shadows now fixed with GNOME 40.3
 * Remove inset shadow from search-entry
 * Fix shadows for gnome 40.3
 * Update GNOME 40.3

[20210623]
 * Improve text and icon shadows to solve issue in GNOME 40
 * Add fedora build-dependency
 * Update sync for gnome 40.2

[20210524]
 * Regenerate css
 * Update for gnome 40.1
 * Improve code syntax highlighting (fixes #181)

[20210421]
 * Regenerate all theme variants
 * Make osd windows more visible for dark themes
 * Make border-radius more consistent
 * Make borders inside popovers more visible
 * Improve assets for switches
 * Update _colors.scss
 * Make dash separator lighter
 * Change dash background to white
 * Fix window-picker close buttons
 * Remove old code from previous gnome versions
 * Remove styles for previous workspace-indicator extension
 * Reduce base border-radius

[20210407]
 * Update assets
 * Update CHANGELOG version 20210406
 * Fix workspace thumbnails for GNOME 40
 * Fix panel text-shadow
 * Set login styles to unlock-dialog
 * Remove old gnome 3.36 code
 * Update for GNOME 40

[20210309]
 * Fix login background script when sh is linked to dash

[20210226]
 * Fix login background script when it's run with sudo

[20210202]
 * Update for gnome 3.38.3

[20210118]
 * Fix calendar event not visible

[20201205]
 * Update for gnome 3.38.2
 * Add gschema configuration for tilix, eof, filechooser & gnome-shell keybindings

[20201117]
 * Fix top bar calendar contrast issue (fixes #165)
 * Add cantarell font as a dependency for ubuntu

[20201022]
 * Set flat-remix-gnome as default session
 * Add Flat-Remix code color-schemes
 * Add gschema override

[20201013]
 * Fix shadows for osd panel
 * Change the background of the search contents
 * Change the background of the app folders to transparent dark
 * Add missing color-pick icon
 * Update gnome 3.38.1

[20200926]
 * Fix app grid for gnome 3.36
 * Fix calendar-week-number's padding for gnome 3.36
 * Fix frequent apps for gnome 3.36
 * Fix activities' close window button position for gnome 3.36
 * Recover black panel

[20200925]
 * Update for gnome-shell 3.38

[20200905]
 * Update for gnome-shell 3.36.5

[20200723]
 * Improve app-folder-dialog design
 * Improve app folders background and add shadow
 * Increase border-radius for all corners
 * Improve top-panel design

[20200624]
 * Fix Flat-Remix session not working
 * Fix makefile: include PopOS as Ubuntu

[20200617]
 * Fix makefile: set Flat-Remix-Blue as the base theme
 * Change assets' colors for each variant
 * Add new color variants to match Flat-Remix GTK themes
 * Update upstream version to 3.36.3

[20200502]
 * Improve miami-dark switch visibility
 * Update gnome-shell 3.36.2
 * Change window-clone-border color
 * Remove dash-to-dock border Fixes #143

[20200420]
* Fix gresource file for ubuntu 20.04
* Update Makefile for Ubuntu installation
* Transparentize window-clone-border
* Add text-shadow to selected app in app switcher
* Osd font tweaks: set font-weight to bold and change light variant color to $fg_color
* Add darkest theme variant
* Add workspace-indicator extension styles

[20200412]
 * Fix osd transparent level bar
 * Remove login entry outline
 * Add shadow to app switcher icons
 * Remove workspace switcher indicator borders
 * Reduce workspace-switcher padding and add shadow to active workspace indicator
 * Improve app switcher
 * Match osd design with pop-overs
 * Increase panel text and icon shadow
 * Change show-apps button background to transparent white
 * Make app folders transparent white
 * Improve workspace pager
 * Remove panel-corner-radius variable
 * Overview window-picker improvements
 * Make search entry transparent

[20200405]
 * Add Miami variants
 * Improve searchbar design
 * Use current background image as gdm background

[20200329]
 * Update login screen design
 * Add login background
 * Add gresource file installation to makefile
 * Add gresource file
 * Makefile add install and uninstall rules
 * Remove search results box like background

 [20200320]
 * Improve app-view-control buttons
 * Flatten all calendar buttons
 * Change calendar date-label font weight
 * Increase calendar events-section-title padding
 * Flatten calendar
 * Remove slider handle
 * Improve popup-menu-items
 * Use $base_border_radius instead of hardcoded px
 * Round out popup sub-menu

[20200314]
 * Align right popover with panel end
 * Add missing css files
 * Remove panel button arrows
 * Remove gnome-shell-high-contrast.scss
 * Add fullPanel variant
 * Change panel background to transparent black for all variants
 * Modify overview window close buttons
 * Add shadow to popovers
 * Make dash transparent
 * Configure checkbox light/dark variants
 * Update panel design using Kali themes as reference
 * Reduce font size
 * Initial setup for gnome 3.36

[20191116]
 * Configure Makefile and package scripts to auto generate login background on install

[20191110]
 * Update CHANGELOG version 20191109
 * Fix theme not being applied to gdm

[20191109]
 * Add cursor accessibility missing icons

[20191027]
 * Fix build.sh script does not parse URL encoded paths; Fixes #111
 * Improve hotplug notification styles

[20190926]
 * Fix blurry popup menus

[20190925]
 * Improve popup-menu margins for gnome-shell 3.34

[20190918]
 * Fix gnome-shell 3.34 colors
 * Add folder editor styles
 * Add folder icon visual drag-over feedback
 * Add horizontal workspaces layout support
 * App icon helper tweaks
 * Increase window overview thumbnail border witdth
 * Provide icon helper classes
 * Don't apply overlap-preventing padding to search results
 * Set search results content max width for gnome-shell 3.34
 * Anotation 'UNTIL GNOME 3.32': custom styling of user submenu icon
 * Add pie-timer styles
 * Add ripple-pointer-location styles
 * Support TCRYPT
 * Move password entry to a grid
 * Remove window-clone-border corner gap

[20190829]
 * Change lightbox background color to black

[20190822]
 * Fix transparent wifi panel button
 * Change search-entry selected text colors

[20190814]
 * Change screenShield notification colors
 * Add panel background transition on overview
 * Change app menu and overview colors
 * Remove panel background on overview

[20190616]
 * Remove .modal-dialog-linked-button inset shadow for light variant
 * Change ScreenShield notification and app folder background
 * Lighten .modal-dialog-linked-button inset shadow

[20190608]
 * Fix Pop OS theme conflicts; Fixes #89

[20190530]
 * Remove dialog linked button focus decoration

[20190514]
 * Use dafault login background if lock image is xml
 * Bring modal-dialog shadow back
 * Fix high contrast switches
 * Syncronize switch assets with gtk theme
 * Add shadow to close icons

files.name: Makefile
files.content:
PKGNAME = flat-remix-gnome
MAINTAINER = Daniel Ruiz de Alegría <daniel@drasite.com>
UBUNTU_RELEASE = jammy
PREFIX ?= /usr
THEMES ?= $(patsubst themes/%/,%,$(wildcard themes/*/))
THEME_VARIANTS = Light Dark Darkest Miami Miami-Dark
BASE_THEME ?= Flat-Remix-Light
BLUR ?= 6
IS_UBUNTU ?= $(shell echo "$$(lsb_release -si 2> /dev/null)" | grep -q 'Ubuntu\|Pop' && echo true)
USER_HOME ?= $(shell eval echo ~$$SUDO_USER)

include src/Makefile.inc

# !! Patch for pamac
# Pamac installs packages as root, no 'sudo' (due to pkexec), so dconf is unable
# to get the user's background. As a workaround HOME env is set to the home
# directory of the user with uid 1000, which probably will be the main user.
ifeq ($(USER_HOME),/root)
	USER_HOME = $(shell eval echo ~$(shell cut -d: -f1,3 /etc/passwd | grep -Po '.*(?=:1000)'))
endif


all: _get_login_background
	-if [ ! -z "$(LOGIN_BACKGROUND)" ] && [ "$(suffix $(LOGIN_BACKGROUND))" != ".xml" ] ; \
	then \
		if [ $(BLUR) -le 1 ] ;\
		then \
			cp -f "$(LOGIN_BACKGROUND)" src/gresource/login-background ;\
		else \
			convert -scale 10% -gaussian-blur 0x$(BLUR) -resize 1000% "$(LOGIN_BACKGROUND)" src/gresource/login-background ;\
		fi; \
	fi
	make -C src/gresource build

_get_login_background:
	$(eval SHELL:=/bin/bash)
	$(eval LOGIN_BACKGROUND ?= \
		$(shell printf "%b" "$$(\
			HOME=$(USER_HOME) dconf read /org/gnome/desktop/background/picture-uri | \
			sed -e 's/file:\/\///' -e 's/%/\\x/g' -e s/\'//g)"))
	@echo "$(LOGIN_BACKGROUND)"

build:
	$(MAKE) -C src build

install:
ifeq ($(DESTDIR),)
	mkdir -p $(PREFIX)/share/themes/
	cp -a $(foreach theme,$(THEMES),themes/$(theme)) $(DESTDIR)$(PREFIX)/share/themes
	cp -r share/ $(PREFIX)/
	glib-compile-schemas $(PREFIX)/share/glib-2.0/schemas/
	mkdir -p $(PREFIX)/share/gnome-shell/theme/
	@ln -sfv $(PREFIX)/share/themes/$(BASE_THEME)/gnome-shell/ $(PREFIX)/share/gnome-shell/theme/$(BASE_THEME)
    ifeq ($(IS_UBUNTU), true)
		cp src/gresource/gnome-shell-theme.gresource $(PREFIX)/share/themes/$(BASE_THEME)/gnome-shell/gnome-shell-theme.gresource
		update-alternatives --install $(PREFIX)/share/gnome-shell/gdm-theme.gresource gdm-theme.gresource $(PREFIX)/share/themes/$(BASE_THEME)/gnome-shell/gnome-shell-theme.gresource 100
    else
		mv -n $(PREFIX)/share/gnome-shell/gnome-shell-theme.gresource $(PREFIX)/share/gnome-shell/gnome-shell-theme.gresource.old || true
		cp -f src/gresource/gnome-shell-theme.gresource $(PREFIX)/share/gnome-shell/gnome-shell-theme.gresource
    endif
else
	mkdir -p $(DESTDIR)$(PREFIX)/share/$(PKGNAME)/
	cp -a Makefile themes src share $(DESTDIR)$(PREFIX)/share/$(PKGNAME)/
endif

uninstall:
	-rm -rf $(foreach theme, $(THEMES), $(PREFIX)/share/themes/$(theme))
	-rm -f $(foreach file, $(shell find share/ -type f), $(PREFIX)/$(file))
	-rm -f $(PREFIX)/share/gnome-shell/theme/$(BASE_THEME)
ifeq ($(IS_UBUNTU), true)
	-update-alternatives --remove gdm-theme.gresource $(PREFIX)/share/themes/$(BASE_THEME)/gnome-shell/gnome-shell-theme.gresource
else
	-mv $(PREFIX)/share/gnome-shell/gnome-shell-theme.gresource.old $(PREFIX)/share/gnome-shell/gnome-shell-theme.gresource
endif

_get_version:
	$(eval VERSION ?= $(shell git show -s --format=%cd --date=format:%Y%m%d HEAD))
	@echo $(VERSION)

_get_tag:
	$(eval TAG := $(shell git describe --abbrev=0 --tags))
	@echo $(TAG)

dist: _get_version
	count=1; \
	for theme_variant in $(foreach THEME, $(THEME_VARIANTS), $(THEME) $(THEME)-fullPanel); \
	do \
		count_pretty=$$(echo "0$${count}" | tail -c 3); \
		(cd themes && tar -cJf "$${count_pretty}-Flat-Remix-$${theme_variant}_$(VERSION).tar.xz" "Flat-Remix-$${theme_variant}") | \
			xz -z - > "$${count_pretty}-Flat-Remix-$${theme_variant}_$(VERSION).tar.xz"; \
		count=$$((count+1)); \
	done; \

release: _get_version
	$(MAKE) generate_changelog VERSION=$(VERSION)
	$(MAKE) aur_release VERSION=$(VERSION)
	git tag -f $(VERSION)
	git push origin --tags
	$(MAKE) dist

aur_release: _get_version
	cd aur; \
	sed "s/pkgver=.*/pkgver=$(VERSION)/" -i PKGBUILD; \
	sed "s/pkgver =.*/pkgver = $(VERSION)/" -i .SRCINFO; \
	git commit -a -m "$(VERSION)"; \
	git push origin master;

	git commit aur -m "Update aur version $(VERSION)"
	git push origin master

copr_release: _get_version
	sed "/Version:/c Version: $(VERSION)" -i $(PKGNAME).spec
	git commit $(PKGNAME).spec -m "Update $(PKGNAME).spec version $(VERSION)"
	git push origin master

launchpad_release: _get_version
	rm -rf /tmp/$(PKGNAME)
	mkdir -p /tmp/$(PKGNAME)/$(PKGNAME)_$(VERSION)
	cp -a * /tmp/$(PKGNAME)/$(PKGNAME)_$(VERSION)
	cd /tmp/$(PKGNAME)/$(PKGNAME)_$(VERSION); \
	echo "$(PKGNAME) ($(VERSION)) $(UBUNTU_RELEASE); urgency=low" > debian/changelog; \
	echo >> debian/changelog; \
	echo "  * Release $(VERSION)" >> debian/changelog; \
	echo >> debian/changelog; \
	echo " -- $(MAINTAINER)  $$(date -R)" >> debian/changelog; \
	debuild -S -d; \
	dput ppa:daniruiz/flat-remix /tmp/$(PKGNAME)/$(PKGNAME)_$(VERSION)_source.changes

generate_changelog: _get_version _get_tag
	git checkout $(TAG) CHANGELOG
	mv CHANGELOG CHANGELOG.old
	echo [$(VERSION)] > CHANGELOG
	printf "%s\n\n" "$$(git log --reverse --pretty=format:' * %s' $(TAG)..HEAD)" >> CHANGELOG
	cat CHANGELOG.old >> CHANGELOG
	rm CHANGELOG.old
	$$EDITOR CHANGELOG
	git commit CHANGELOG -m "Update CHANGELOG version $(VERSION)"
	git push origin HEAD

clean:
	-make -C src clean

.PHONY: all _get_login_background build install uninstall _get_version _get_tag dist release aur_release copr_release launchpad_release generate_changelog
